title.en: Prayer to Root and Lineage Masters, and the Assembly of Deity, Ḍākinīs and Dharma Protectors of the Sakya Lineage

text.en: Root and lineage masters of the Sakya tradition of Mañjuśrī Protectors,
text.en-trans: jamgön sakyé tsa gyü lama dang

text.en: Glorious Hevajra, who is the most essential yidam deity,
And the assembly of ḍākinīs, dharma protectors and deities of wealth,
text.en-trans: khandro chökyong norlhé tsok nam la

text.en: In devotion I pray to you: look upon me with eyes of wisdom!
text.en-trans: güpé soldeb yeshe chen gyi zik

text.en: May I and all those sentient beings who are connected with me
text.en-trans: dak dang dak gi dreltsé yichen nam

text.en: Live long, be free of illness, and increase our realization and experiences in this life;
text.en-trans: tsé dir tsering nemé nyamtok pel

text.en: And when we take rebirth in the pureland of Great Bliss in the next,
text.en-trans: chima dechen dakpé zhing kyé né

text.en: Bless us so that we may guide all beings of the three realms.
text.en-trans: kham sum dro kün drenpar jingyi lob
